snippet: Top seed and defending champion Novak Djokovic's road to a sixth Australian Open title starts with a first-round match against South Korean young gun Chung Hyeon, while women's champion Serena Williams faces feisty Italian Camila Giorgi....
lead_paragraph: Top seed and defending champion Novak Djokovic's road to a sixth Australian Open title starts with a first-round match against South Korean young gun Chung Hyeon, while women's champion Serena Williams faces feisty Italian Camila Giorgi.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Battle Rising South Korean First Up
headline.main: Djokovic to Battle Rising South Korean First Up
